body:
Comment 11: 
All the patches listed above are now applied to the release branch, except for

  issue #5922  : runtime: prevent sysmon from polling network excessivly
  https://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=6b3c351c7fe6

which is still under discussion. If it is to be applied, a patch will need to be written
by hand as the existing patch does not apply cleanly (it's a one line change, but the
change depends on the surrounding code).
